Package manito.eft.interfaces

Class DeviceEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • manito.eft.interfaces.DeviceRequest
      • manito.eft.interfaces.DeviceEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    public class DeviceEvent
extends DeviceRequest
    Entity class for holding details of an event on the device proxy channel.

    This is provided as a separate class for backward compatibility.

    This covers terminal-generated payment events such as "CardInserted" but also system-generated events when used in a wider context such as "Dispensing" when EFTLInk is used in an OPT fuel environment.
